title: KMPlayer (Mirror Mode, HD) v3.0.6 (Ad-Free) - ArmaanPC
description:
KMPlayer (Mirror Mode, HD) v3.0.6 (Ad-Free) - ArmaanPC


KMPlayerthe player does not need the view. This is one of the most popular players for any operating system. Recently, the owners of smartphones running the Android operating system can also enjoy all the benefits of this player. As in computer analogs, all the latest versions of decoders are built into the mobile version of the video player, so that it can play video and audio files of any formats.

 A feature of KMPlayer is a very rich functionality. To date, KMPlayer is rightfully considered one of the best video players for Android, and certainly the best development of Pandora TV. Until recently, only users of desktop computers could use the analogue of this program. Now all the benefits of KMPlayer can be appreciated by the owners of mobile devices running Android.

 Following the technical progress, the KMPlayer video player provides the ability to view streaming video, which eliminates the need to fully download the file to the smartphone.

The utility is able to record video and save it on a memory card. Even if this or that media file is badly damaged, the power of this video player is enough to restore it and lose it.

Supported file formats: 3gp, 3gp2, 3gpp, amv, asf, avi, axv, divx, dv, flv, f4v, gvi, gxf, m1v, m2p, m2t, m2ts, m2v, m4v, mks, mkv, moov, mov, mp2v, mp4, mpeg, mpeg1, mpeg2, mpeg4, mpg, mpv, mt2s, mts, mxf, nsv, nuv, oga, ogg, ogm, ogv, ogx, spx, ps, qt, rec, rm, rmvb, tod, ts, tts, vob, vro, webm, wm, wmv, wtv, xesc.

Features Mod - Removed ads - Works Cloud Drive - Google Analytics is disabled - Removed ad banner design - Removed all advertising calls from the activity manifest - Removed banner display of all ads in tablet mode

Change to v3.0.6
